When placed on your hotbar, this flask
fills with up to 5 essence over time
and can be emptied into the
block.flor.natures_oculus.druidic_scepte: A sickle tool that can be used to
It also shows your current biome's
block.flor.natures_oculus.pylons.unlocke: The essence can be extracted by
Placing pylons within 12 blocks of each
Any wood works in the recipe.
block.flor.natures_oculus.ignition_rod.u: The Ignition Rod can be used to
The rays ignite blocks and damage mobs.
The rod uses 1 Arid Essence from a
flask in the offhand per cast.
block.flor.natures_oculus.frost_rod.unlo: The Frost Rod can be used to
The rod uses 1 Aqueous Essence from a
flask in the offhand per cast.
block.flor.natures_oculus.overgrowth_rod: The Overgrowth Rod can be used to
bind up a mob in vines.
Bound mobs cannot move for 10 seconds.
The rod uses 2 Verdant Essence from a
flask in the offhand per cast.
block.flor.natures_oculus.absorbloom.unl: The flower can only hold a
The essence can be used by other flowers
They have a range of 9 blocks.
block.flor.natures_oculus.dispoppy.unloc: They have a range of 9 blocks.
block.flor.natures_oculus.relilay.unlock: but draw from other flowers instead of pylons.
However, they will only ever draw from the closest flower,
regardless of whether it has any essence.
They have an extended range of 15 blocks.
block.flor.natures_oculus.basic_runes.un: Basic Runes are used for many
in your Oculus for some uses.
block.flor.natures_oculus.floramancer's_: or other similar block to show
info on its range, connections, and more.
block.flor.natures_oculus.mystical_furna: Accepts Arid Essence from Dispoppies to smelt items
block.flor.natures_oculus.burning_scepte: An upgraded Ignition Rod, the Burning Scepter
fires higher damage flames at the cost of 1 Arid Essence.
The flames set fire, like their predacessor's.
block.flor.natures_oculus.blizzard_scept: An upgraded Frost Rod, the Blizzard Scepter
fires higher damage cold blasts at the cost of 1 Aqueous Essence.
The cold blasts further slow entities.
An upgraded Overgrowth Rod, the Snare Scepter
fires magic snares at the cost of 2 Verdant Essence.
The snares damage and slow grounded entities.
block.flor.natures_oculus.ender_rift_sce: The Ender Rift Scepter allows you to
teleport to a targetted location at the cost of 2 Arid Essence.
block.flor.natures_oculus.erosion_scepte: The Erosion Scepter allows you to mine
large amounts of block using Aqueous Essence.
Care must be taken, as the water stream
block.flor.natures_oculus.mending_scepte: The Mending Scepter allows you to heal yourself
at the cost of 2 Verdant Essence, or another targetted entity
block.flor.natures_oculus.essence_vessel: Unlike flasks, it can only be filled via Dispoppies.
Its essence can be used for spellcasting.
block.flor.natures_oculus.runic_pylons.u: Runic Pylons are an improved variant of Pylons.
They gather essence thrice as fast.
block.flor.natures_oculus.essence_alloys: These alloys are used to make essence-empowered tools.
Any raw essence can be used in the recipe;
the raw essence used determines which type of essence is consumed
and which ingot variety is produced.
These tools repair themselves using essence from your offhand.
Any of the essence ingots can be used to make any of the vanilla tools.
The ingot type determines which essence the tool uses and costs to make.
Shown below is an example for the Arid Pickaxe.
block.flor.natures_oculus.attuned_pylons: Attuned Pylons are an augmented variant of Pylons.
They gather only the essence type they are attuned to,
even when not in a biome normally yielding it.
They can be made with either of the three essence types,
creating a pylon attuned to that essence.
block.flor.natures_oculus.essence_capaci: Essence Capacitors are blocks that can
When given a redstone signal, they accept up to 20
When not given a signal, they release their essence
block.flor.natures_oculus.scorching_arc_: An improved Arid Sword, this sword is diamond-tier.
It also creates flaming sweep attacks that strike
hostiles close to your main target.
block.flor.natures_oculus.burning_fire_a: An improved Arid Axe, this axe is diamond-tier.
It also fells entire trees at once.
block.flor.natures_oculus.raging_river_p: An improved Aqueous Pickaxe, this pickaxe is diamond-tier.
It also cleaves away entire ore clusters at once.
block.flor.natures_oculus.fortunate_seek: An improved Verdant Shovel, this shovel is diamond-tier.
It also replaces the normal drops of dirt and sand
with occasional treasures like metal nuggets.
block.flor.natures_oculus.bountiful_eart: An improved Verdant Hoe, this hoe is diamond-tier.
It also has all the functionality of
block.flor.natures_oculus.druidic_lauret: Wear on your head to double spirit spawn rate
block.flor.natures_oculus.redstone_contr: Feed a redstone signal into this block
to disable a flower directly under it.
block.flor.natures_oculus.advanced_runes: Advanced Runes are used for some powerful mystical creations.
See the newly unlocked page in your Oculus for some uses.
block.flor.natures_oculus.mineroot.unloc: You have managed to refine your formulas for flowers
The Mineroot sapling uses all three types of essence at once to
grow, dredging up ores from deep underground in the process.
Ores within a 100x24 area under the Mineroot sapling are dug up
and stored within the tree's roots.
Chop down the tree to receive the minerals.
More valuable ores are dredged up by larger trees.
block.flor.natures_oculus.charm_of_invoc: The Charm of Invocation channels essence to
bestow a variety of temporary boons.
Right click to enable an invocation, using corresponding
The invocation gradually consumes essence to grant
buffs based on the essence used.
block.flor.natures_oculus.enchanting_wit: Using the Enchanting Station, you can enchant items
by infusing them with the essences of nature.
Enchantments are applied one level at a time,
with costs based on the level.
Put an item in the slot, then click
an enchantment icon to apply a level of that enchantment.
block.flor.natures_oculus.thundering_tem: You have formulated an aqueous-infused bow.
Like other essence tools, this bow self-repairs with essence.
It also uses aqueous essence to infuse
arrows with the strength of a gale,
block.flor.natures_oculus.adept_floraman: can show many ranges or connections at
block.flor.natures_oculus.filter_seals.u: Filter Seals allow blocks' essence intake
to be limited to one type.
A block or flower can have one Filter Seal.
only interact with other filtered flowers.
Use a different essence alloy in the recipe
The amount of seal slots depends on block tier.
Arcane Pliers can be used to
check the seals and slots on a block,
block.flor.natures_oculus.another_vision: The Deeproot has revealed secrets to you.
See the new page in your Oculus
to discover the twisted knowledge it has bestowed.
block.flor.natures_oculus.spirit_binder_: You have devised the ultimate magical weapon.
This staff uses 2 of any essence to fire magic orbs
which home in on enemies and deal significant damage.
Secondary effects depend on the essence used.
block.flor.natures_oculus.reinforced_ves: To power some items you will need vast amounts of essence.
This variant of the Essence Vessel holds 100 essence instead of 25,
block.flor.natures_oculus.reinforced_pyl: This variant of the Runic Pylon collects esssence thrice as fast.
block.flor.natures_oculus.circlets_of_ma: These circlets come in each essence type.
They provide a 50% magic damage buff for the respective essence,
and significantly reduce magic damage from two specific essences.
The reduction is less significant when invoking the unresisted essence.
Any essence and corresponding alloy used will make its own circlet.
block.flor.natures_oculus.essence_reserv: this multiblock structure consists of a 3x3 cube
centered on a Reservoir Core (recipe shown below).
Place essence-tied blocks like netherrack, prismarine, or logs
in the area around the core to add storage to it.
On the 8 corners of the structure, mineral blocks can be used.
They add large amounts of storage in all types.
The reservoir can have storage of multiple types at once.
Otherwise it functions like a Capacitor in every way.
block.flor.natures_oculus.master_florama: - Know Adept Floramancer's Scepter and Essence Alloys
block.flor.natures_oculus.essence_transm: Relilays are no longer powerful enough;
you have formulated a new way of moving essence.
Place the Transmission Beacon on top of
a 4-block tall pillar of essence-tied blocks
Then, supply it with 20 essence and the essence will be sent
to the Beacon's bound Transmission Receiver.
You can bind them by right clicking the
Beacon, then the Receiver with a Floramancer's Wand.
This transmission is lossy, more so across
longer distances; better essence blocks reduce this loss.
There is a 1 minute cooldown between transmissions.
block.flor.natures_oculus.exobiotic_armo: You have formulated a powerful suit of arcane armor.
This armor absorbs the matching essence
from a storage held in your offhand,
storing and using it to provide nearly diamond-level defenses
as well as magic damage, magic resistance, and move speed
for the helmet, chestplate, and leggings respectively.
The armor's true might lies in its magical powers,
which correspond to the chosen essence type.
on different pieces to wield different powers!
The armor cannot be broken traditionally,
but will deactivate when lacking essence.
The recipes shown go for any type.
block.flor.natures_oculus.exobiotic_flai: You have figured out how to cosmetically
Use an existing Exobiotic piece in
one of these recipes to change its appearance.
block.flor.natures_oculus.purified_wafer: This stackable food item cleanses you
of all status effects when eaten.
block.flor.natures_oculus.echoroot.unloc: the essence off a block at once,
storing up to 20 of each type.
However, it loses one point of essence
block.flor.natures_oculus.shryroot.unloc: rends essence on flowers within 15 blocks
free and causes it to fly away from the Shryroot
This projectile deposits all its essence
when it hits a block, or deals damage if it hits

item.flor.burning_fire_axe.lore: Burning flames harvest entire trees at once.

item.flor.charm_of_invocation.lore.2: Use again to disable the invocation.

item.flor.enchanting_station.lore: Uses essence to apply enchantments to items.
item.flor.ender_rift_scepter.lore.0: Right click to teleport using Arid Essence
item.flor.erosion_scepter.lore.0: Right click to fire a stream of water using Aqueous Essence,

item.flor.ignition_rod.lore.1: dealing damage and lighting a fire.
item.flor.infused_workbench.lore.0: The beginnings of the mystical arts

Hold essence in the offhand and shift right click

item.flor.pylon.lore.1: Placing pylons close together reduces yield.

item.flor.scorching_arc_sword.lore: Attacks strike nearby mobs with blazing sweeps.
item.flor.snare_scepter.lore.0: Right click to shoot a snare using Verdant Essence,
item.flor.snare_scepter.lore.1: dealing damage and immobilizing a mob it hits.
item.flor.spirit_binder_staff.lore.0: Right click to shoot magic orbs using 2 of any essence,
item.flor.spirit_binder_staff.lore.1: dealing significant damage and secondary effects.
item.flor.thundering_tempest_bow.lore.0: Fires gale-wreathed arrows with greater velocity and pierce.
item.flor.thundering_tempest_bow.lore.1: Only functions in the main hand.
item.flor.transmission_beacon.lore.1: when bound to a Receiver and filled up.
item.flor.transmission_beacon.lore.2: Loss rate depends on distance and essence-tied blocks used.
item.flor.transmission_receiver.lore.0: Receives essence from a Transmission Beacon.
item.flor.transmission_receiver.lore.1: Releases the essence like a Capacitor does.
item.flor.verdant_attuned_pylon.lore.0: Collects exclusively Verdant Essence over time.

item.flor.verdant_mastery_circlet.lore.1: and greatly reduces taken damage from verdant and aqueous magic.

item.flor.verdant_upgrade_seal.lore.1: Typically upgrades efficiency of a block.
item.flor.echoroot.lore.0: Takes all essence in one go.
item.flor.echoroot.lore.1: Loses 1 essence per type per operation.
item.flor.shryroot.lore.2: that deposit their essence in any block hit.
item.flor.visions.0:
I have seen something unfamiliar within the nature surrounding me. It has shown me an epiphany of sorts.

I believe there are a few objects I can create to learn more about the world around me.
item.flor.visions.1.line.1: This Infused Workbench will allow me to harness the raw essence dropped by the spirits that flit around at times.
item.flor.visions.2: The workbench has a slot into which essence can be inserted. Recipes in this workbench will use up that essence to create objects. There are three flavors of essence, each obtainable from different spirits in different locales.
item.flor.visions.3.line.1: Within that workbench, this Oculus can be made in order to allow me insight deeper into this magic.
item.flor.visions.4: Using the knowledge points the spirits grant me, I can unlock new recipes. Simply place the requisite materials on the locked slot representing a specific recipe to unlock it.
item.flor.visions.5:
I am sure there are many deeper, much more powerful secrets I can discover by delving into the mysterious magic of nature. 

But before I can put these secrets to use, I will have to unearth them.
